meanings.sent1: After the break, they reengaged in the game.
meanings.sent2: She reengaged in the conversation after being distracted.
meanings.sent3: The students reengaged in the lesson after a short break.
meanings.sent4: The team reengaged in the project with renewed enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: He reengaged in his hobby of painting with fresh inspiration.

meanings.definition: To participate or take part in something again.
meanings.sent1: They reengaged in the event after missing the first part.
meanings.sent2: She reengaged in the club activities after a brief hiatus.
meanings.sent3: The audience reengaged in the show after the intermission.
meanings.sent4: The employees reengaged in the training session with focus.
meanings.sent5: He reengaged in the sport he loved after a long break.
